title: Interpretation of dreams about cutting off a leg in a dream by Ibn Sirin and interpretation of a dream about cutting off another person’s leg

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cutting a man in a dream The interpretation of a dream about cutting a man in a dream has multiple connotations, which the dreamer seeks to identify, after being afraid of this vision, and the details of the vision may differ from one person to another. Some of them saw that the leg was cut off from the knee, and some of them saw that it was cut off from the thigh, and other details differ in their interpretation among themselves. Interpretation of a dream about cutting off a leg in a dream. It is said in the interpretation of this vision that it is an expression of the loss that the dreamer suffers in his life, and this loss can It is for money or people, and if someone sees in a dream that he is the one who cuts. his leg; He will make a grave mistake that will cause him to misbehave, which will ultimately lead him to a huge loss. If the dreamer is a merchant, he will lose his money and his position among merchants, and reading here is evidence of thinking carefully when making any decision or entering into any agreement that may cause It is a great loss for him. As for an unmarried girl seeing this vision, it is evidence of her being forced to accept a husband who is not suitable for her just to get married and escape from the hell of psychological problems that she suffers from in the family home, but she must wait, because marriage is a complete life, and she must not rush and wait for the most suitable. Her religion and morals come first. A married woman who cuts off one or both of her legs believes that she cannot face the difficulties she is going through and lives in misery with her husband, who causes her a lot of problems because of his bad behavior. Interpretation of a dream about cutting off a leg according to Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin said that seeing a person cutting off his leg in a dream is one of the unpleasant visions for the fortuneteller and expresses the loss of important things in life and entry into a state of sadness and depression. The Imam said: If an unmarried man is cut off in a married man’s dream This is evidence of separation between him and his wife due to serious marital problems and disagreements. But if he owns a business or trade, he will lose half of his wealth and must try to stand on his feet again until he regains the glories of the past and obtains profits as they were in the past, and this will happen in the future. , but since he uses his mind well and does not make wrong decisions in difficult times. If the dreamer is still young, then his vision is evidence of the loss of a loved one, and that person relied on him to manage his life’s affairs or give him advice, which helped him a lot. In his previous life and making him able to overcome the crises that he went through. Interpretation of seeing a man wounding an unmarried woman. If you cut off a girl’s husband in her dream and she had one leg, then she will be exposed to serious fluctuations in her life, which may force her to agree to marry someone she does not consider suitable, but she will be Tied to him for his sake. For a while, then she separated from him of her own free will, but if she saw her legs cut off and intended to complete them. And if she studies or travels abroad, all her work will be suspended and reconsidered. It was said in a dream that it is positive to see a girl cutting off her leg in a dream that there is a person who has suffered from his loss for a long time, but soon he will be happy to return and stand by his side.

title: Interpretation of seeing my husband crying in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing my husband crying in a dream. Some people want to know the interpretation of seeing my husband crying in a dream, and it is one of the very disturbing dreams, so they are looking for an interpretation of this dream, but the reader must also absolutely prohibit it from disbelief because it is the jurisprudence of some scholars who seek to reach the truth, as well as the website and its employees. They have nothing to do with interpretations. Interpretation of seeing my husband crying in a dream: If a woman sees that her husband is crying a lot, this may indicate serious problems and troubles that he may suffer from for a long time. Dreaming of a husband crying in a dream may indicate enjoying family blessings and great stability during this time. If she sees If a woman dreams that her husband was crying in a dream, this may be a sign that some changes are occurring in her life at that time. Dreaming of a husband crying in a dream could be a sign of a problem that falls on the husband’s shoulders and he needs to ask God for help to get rid of it. Interpretation of a dream about a husband beating his wife In front of his family in a dream: If a woman sees her husband hitting her in front of his family, this may indicate his great love for her at that time. The husband hitting his wife in a dream may be a sign of the good relationship that exists between them. And God knows best. If a woman sees her husband beating her in front of his family in a dream, this may indicate changes in their lives during this time. And God knows best. A dream about a husband beating his wife in front of his family in a dream may indicate material gains and many good things that will come to them in those days by God’s grace. Interpretation of seeing my husband holding my hand in a dream If a woman sees that her husband was holding her hands in a dream, this may indicate A happy married life during that period, thanks to God. Dreaming of a husband holding a woman’s hand in a dream may indicate good changes that will occur in their lives during this period. Anyone who sees in her dream that her husband was holding her hands may indicate positive changes that will occur in their lives during that period. Seeing a husband holding a woman’s hand in a dream may indicate happy events that will happen to them on those days, and God knows best. Seeing a husband holding his wife’s hand in a dream may mean that he has overcome enemies or happy events that come his way on those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a husband defending his wife in a dream: If a woman sees that her husband was defending her in a dream, this may indicate protecting him from any harm or evil that he may face during those days. A dream about a husband defending his wife in front of his family in a dream may indicate emerging from a serious experience Or a problem that he suffers from in those days. If a woman sees her husband defending her, this indicates that he will protect her from any harm that she may be exposed to from those around her in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my husband kissing my feet in a dream: If a woman dreams that her husband is kissing her feet, This may indicate the intense love that existed between them at that time, thanks to God. Dreaming of a husband kissing his wife’s feet in a dream may indicate the marital bliss they were enjoying at that time, and God knows best. If a woman dreams that her husband is kissing her feet, she may

title: Interpretation of a wedding in a dream - Interpretation of a dream about a wedding in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of the marriage of a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, or a divorced woman, whether it is the wedding party, the groom, the bride, or Ibn Sirin’s white dress, and so on.Interpretation of a wedding in a dreamInterpretation of marriage in a dream by Al-NabulsiIf the wedding in a dream is with acquaintances and beliefs, then the person will die in The place where the wedding was held. And whoever dreams that he is going to get married, and he does not see a bride and does not know her, then he will die, and if he sees her or describes her, this world will accept him. Al-Nabulsi interpreted the dream of a dream as joy in a dream that indicates worry and sadness because the Almighty says: “Do not be happy, for God does not love.” “The joyful ones.” Perhaps it indicates a distraction from obedience. Joy turns into sadness. Ibn Sirin says about a dream about a dream of joy: It is anguish, because the Almighty says {He does not like happy people}. The great translator Sheikh Abd al-Ghani al-Nabulsi says in his famous book (The Smell of Animals in the Interpretation of a Dream): If the wedding or marriage involves playing, dancing, and crying, it appears Sadness or distress in the place where he gets married. It occurred. Whoever sees his wedding or party and does not see his bride or know her, an event or bad news will happen to him. Interpretation of marriage in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Whoever sees a wedding and there is no fun in it while it is still a celebration, then it announces goodness and blessing, especially if there is something good-looking. If he sees the opposite, do not praise him, especially if there is dancing. It is a misfortune, and a stranger is a misfortune, and one gaggle is a small thing, and it was said that marriage is a misfortune for the one who accepts it, and for the one who invites to it there is joy and happiness if he does not see it. food. Whoever dreams that the marriage order is carried out, some of his family will remain at his funeral, and whoever sees that the wedding is in a house where there is a sick person, then this is evidence of his death. It is not praiseworthy. Whoever sees that he is happy and happy, then he will be sad and sad, and whoever sees that he is happy in one way, then he will feel sorry for him, according to the Almighty’s words. They rejoiced in what God gave them of His bounty. And whoever sees that they are happy for no reason, this indicates the approach of their guardianship, according to the Almighty’s words: “Even if they rejoice in what they have been given.” Interpretation of a wedding or marriage in a dream for a single woman: If he sees an unmarried woman as if she were attending a wedding party and meeting the newlyweds, then this A good interpretation, unless you see the unmarried girl dancing, and a wedding in this context is considered good news, especially if it is held in it. A religious or traditional atmosphere within customary celebrations and customs. A wedding in an unmarried girl’s dream symbolizes a happy event on the horizon related to her future ambitions and aspirations. But if the wedding or wedding in the dream belongs to the unmarried woman herself, which means that she sees her wedding in In a dream, this is a good omen in any case, especially if the groom in the dream is known to her. It was devoid of entertainment, such as dancing and playing rhythmic instruments such as drums and tambourines, and the dream interpretation does not like hearing the sound of the flute and all instruments that rely on wind. Marriage or marriage in any person’s dream is considered an indication of the beginning of a new life, whether that is on a practical, emotional, or personal level. Even social. Marriage in an unmarried woman’s dream is very praiseworthy if she sees in her dream that she is wearing a white dress, which is praiseworthy as well as if

title: Interpretation of a dream about driving a luxury car for a man

preview.html: It can be a sign of one's balance and success, and we will see the details of this dream through this article from our website gptafser.com/. Interpretation of a dream about driving a luxury car in a dream for a single girl Driving a luxury car in a dream for a single woman. It symbolizes the gains that come to him, whether in the financial or emotional state. And if the unmarried woman drives a luxury car. A good gesture that spreads the good news of a happy marriage to a person who is loyal to religion and fears God with her and enjoys justice. God knows best. In the case of parallel and balanced driving of the car. A sign that this girl will achieve the things she wants to achieve and that she will enjoy stability. The previous vision may have another meaning, which is that this girl's life will witness good, non-negative changes and will be happy in her coming days, God knows best. Driving a luxury car in a dream is good news for a husband who enjoys a high social status. Seeing a virgin girl driving a car is good news for communicating with a suitable and wise person in making decisions. Which he gets as he has a leadership personality, God willing. If the girl was driving without balance and was reckless while driving. A sign for her of the problems that come to her because of the people who enter her life that she must be careful. Driving a car without training symbolizes the confusion of the girl who will suffer in the coming period. And because of her engagement to men, she must ask God Almighty in her matter. When a virgin girl drives a modern car, this is a sign of debts that she will be able to pay off. She will also live happily in the coming period, God willing. Seeing a red car in a dream for a single woman. A sign that her future husband will be a man of influence and money, God knows best. The previous dream may symbolize the girl And her insistence on achieving what she wants and wants. If he is driving a red car, this symbolizes his attractive personality. The vision indicates that the unmarried woman is the one driving the car in the dream. In the strength of her personality and in the government's control over herself and others. The car broke down while the girl was driving it. Perhaps it is a sign for her of things that she will not overcome due to difficulties, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of dreams for a car that works without a driver Interpretation of seeing riding a luxury car in a dream for a married woman A married woman driving a luxury car in her dream. A sign of goodness and livelihood that comes to her after a long wait. And the luxury car in a dream for a married woman and she rides in it. It symbolizes the qualities that this woman possesses, which are creativity, honesty, loyalty and distinction. Seeing a woman riding a luxury car in her dream is considered a dream. A good sign of her condition that she will notice a noticeable improvement after her bad condition. And a woman suffering from childbirth and saw herself riding a luxury car. Good news of pregnancy, God willing. The vision of the white car that the married woman rides appears. In her exceptional luck, she will get it, and her life is comfortable and calm. If a married woman sees herself driving the car Alone. It indicates that her husband does not help her in any of

title: Interpretation of a dream about green lemon: seeing lemon in a dream

preview.html: A single woman seeing a lemon for a pregnant woman or a divorced woman, whether it was picked from fruit trees or green or yellow juice, according to Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of lemon in a dream. Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him, said in the book attributed to him: Lemon in a dream indicates illness if its color is yellow, and eating lemon in A dream represents livelihood or money, and green lemons are better than that. Yellow, and any yellow fruit indicates illness. In a dream, a man knows he is a lemon, then he blames and criticizes him. The lemon tree is a man who is useful to people and is also a generous and generous woman. Her kindness is great. A lemon, if a girl sees one, has many connotations. A green lemon in a dream shows the kindness of a girl’s heart. A yellow lemon shows the jealousy she carries in her heart. If an unmarried woman picks lemons in her dream, this is a symbol of the matter for her father. Lemon juice in a person’s dream indicates that the heart is tired if she drinks it. If an unmarried woman in a dream offers lemon juice to someone, This is evidence that she will cause him problems. If a married woman sees a green lemon in her dream, it means money or good luck. Picking lemons in a married woman’s dream from a lemon tree indicates pregnancy. Yellow lemons in a dream indicate fatigue, worry, and worry, and may indicate a quarrel. In a pregnant woman’s dream, Lemon has different interpretations. Yellow lemon indicates pregnancy problems and the number of lemons. A pregnant woman knows the months she has left to give birth. Green lemons are a blessing for her, and lemon juice indicates her imminent birth. Interpretation of a lemon in one dream. Lemons in a person’s dream have many meanings. Green lemons in a dream show the goodness of one's heart, and yellow can indicate jealousy. Picking lemons in a person's dream is to win the heart of a loved one. A lemon tree in her dream can symbolize a guardian or a father, and lemon juice can indicate heart problems if she drinks it and if she offers lemon juice to someone, it causes him trouble and you do not believe him and do not exchange the same feelings of friendship with him. Interpretation of lemon in a woman’s dream Married Woman: Lemon in a married woman’s dream is better, God willing, if she sees it green, and it can indicate money or good luck, and picking lemons from a lemon tree indicates the presence of pregnancy, God willing, and yellow lemons are tired, worries and distress and can indicate rivalry. Interpretation of lemon in a dream Pregnant WomanLemon in a pregnant woman's dream also has many interpretations. Yellow, for example, indicates pregnancy problems, the number of lemons can indicate days, weeks or months remaining for labor or delivery, green lemons can indicate a boy, a lemon tree is a blessing, lemons picked close to delivery date and lemon juice is good It may indicate safety. Interpretation of picking lemons in a dream: Whoever dreams that he picks a beautiful green lemon and eats it, this indicates that he will acquire something valuable, perhaps money or knowledge. Interpretation of lemon juice in a dream: Whoever sees in a dream that he is squeezing a lemon and drinking it, this indicates troubles.

Interpretation of picking lemons in a dream Whoever dreams that he picks a beautiful green lemon and eats it, this indicates that he will acquire something valuable, perhaps money or knowledge. Interpretation of lemon juice in a dream Whoever sees in a dream that he squeezes a lemon and drinks it, this indicates problems

title: Interpretation of seeing a boy in a dream

preview.html: This is the interpretation of seeing a boy in a dream. God Almighty said: (They said: Obscene dreams. And we do not interpret dreams with two worlds (44)). Who is chosen by God Almighty, and what is unseen is known only to God Almighty. Therefore, we should not be overly concerned about dreams. So that we can live a normal life, and in today’s article from the encyclopedia we present in detail the interpretation of seeing a boy in a dream, follow us.Interpretation of seeing a boy in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a child in a dream by Ibn SirinIf someone sees in a dream a group of male children. This vision expresses imminent success and excellence in life and the individual’s ability to achieve all his goals. If one sees a baby being breastfed in a dream. This vision symbolizes the abundance of sustenance and goodness that comes to the person who sees it. Seeing a person in a dream that he is blessed with a group of male children. This vision shows the approach of many troubles and sorrows that the dreamer will face, and these sorrows will disappear from the dreamer later. If a young man sees in a dream a small child. This vision symbolizes his close marriage, and getting rid of all the problems and fears that a person faces in his life. Seeing a person in a dream that he is breastfeeding a small child. This vision expresses that the money this person earns is prohibited. Whoever sees in his dream that he is touching a small child. This indicates that he will soon have a lot of money. If one sees in a dream that he is carrying a child. This indicates the high positions that the dreamer will move to and the abundant money that will come to him. Seeing a male child in a dream for an unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin. If an unmarried girl sees a child in her dream. This vision expresses her future marriage. Whoever saw a child in her dream but did not remember his characteristics. This vision expresses that he will soon find himself in great trouble. Seeing a boy in an unmarried girl’s dream symbolizes problems in her love life, which may lead to separation. If a single girl who is suffering from many problems in her life sees a boy in a dream. This vision expresses this girl's immediate relief. Seeing an unmarried girl in her dream with a boy with baby hair indicates her close separation from her lover. Seeing an unmarried girl in her dream means that she is carrying a child in her arms. In the presence of someone who loves her very much and wants to communicate with her. A single girl sees herself buying a young boy. This vision expresses the presence of many problems and difficulties that she will soon face. Seeing a handsome male child in a dream for an unmarried woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream a “boy” child who is distinguished by his beauty. This vision is good news for her upcoming marriage. An unmarried girl seeing a beautiful child in her dream expresses her repentance, integrity, and abandonment of her sins and transgressions that she constantly commits. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream and a beautiful child crawling toward her. This vision symbolizes the approach of her happy marriage to a man who loves her. Interpretation of a dream about a new baby for a married woman: If a married woman sees a boy in her dream. This vision expresses that she will become pregnant soon. Among the interpretations of seeing a boy in a dream for a Mitzvah woman

title: The 10 most famous interpretations and meanings of wearing shoes in a dream bode well

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing shoes? Evidence of widespread food. Interpretation of wearing cut-off shoes in a dream? Evidence that the dreamer will marry a woman but have a son. What is the interpretation of seeing white shoes for a single girl? It indicates good news. What does it mean to see a single person wearing shoes without laces? It indicates To his marriage to a girl whom he had never married. Interpretation of a married woman’s dream that a shoe is burning? It indicates her trip, but without her consent. Interpretation of a dream about wearing shoes by Ibn Sirin. Shoes in general in a dream are evidence of following an extensive diet. After that, if a person sees in a dream a child’s shoe, This is evidence of the dreamer’s desire to gain sympathy and tenderness. After that, the dream of wearing cut-off shoes is evidence that the dreamer will marry a woman, but will have a child. Seeing a dream of wearing shoes for single women: Seeing a girl in a dream buying black shoes, this indicates a new job that she will find soon Then, seeing white shoes in an unmarried girl’s dream may indicate good news that she will hear soon. White shoes in a dream for an unmarried woman may indicate participation from a person of high status. Then if the girl sees in her dream that she is cleaning the shoes that she is wearing, then this It indicates the preparations that will be made before her marriage. Then, if the girl takes shoes from someone in the dream, this indicates that she will be engaged in the near future. Then, if the girl takes shoes from a stranger, this is an indication of the position she will take. Shoes in a girl’s dream may It indicates marriage soon. Interpretation of a dream about wearing shoes for a married woman. If a married woman sees that she is wearing dirty shoes and full of dirty things, this indicates that there are people in her life who criticize her and do not like her life. If a married woman dreams that she dyes the shoes she is wearing black, this means that she will achieve Her goals and dreams and she gets what she wants for success and excellence. Then seeing a married woman wearing wooden shoes is evidence that she is a hypocrite. Then seeing a married woman’s soles being burned indicates that she is traveling, but without her consent. Interpretation of a dream about wearing shoes for a man: seeing a man in a dream that he is wearing cut-off shoes And he does not walk in it, as this indicates his marriage to a married woman. Then seeing a young man wearing shoes without laces, this indicates his marriage to a girl whom he had not married before. Then whoever sees in his dream that his shoes were cut off on the road, he will be exposed to something that will delay his journey. So, the Seeing a man wearing tight shoes in a dream is a sign of poor livelihood and livelihood. title: Interpretation of seeing saffron in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing saffron in a dream is one of the visions that many people promise. This is because saffron is actually one of the beautiful things that one can enjoy, and there are many clues and meanings that can be deduced from seeing saffron in a dream. General information: To get a general idea of ​​the meaning of egg yolk in a dream, but without concluding any interpretation of any vision that may be similar to a vision, we will not mention it except after it has been reviewed by a specialized interpreter. Read also: A feast in a dream. Interpretation of saffron in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing saffron in a dream. Ibn Sirin believes You will see that the interpretation of seeing saffron in a dream is one of the visions that indicate good words spoken about the dreamer’s right. Also, saffron in a dream is an indication of the money that the dreamer will be able to acquire. Painting the body with saffron is a dream that indicates the valuable property that the dreamer will obtain. Also When you dream that you are grinding saffron, this indicates that there is one of the amazing things that the dreamer has done. Also, saffron in a dream can sometimes be a sign of the dreamer’s false dreams that he is living in. Read also: Seeing pins in a dream Seeing saffron in a woman’s dream Single: The interpretation of seeing saffron in a dream for a single girl indicates joy, happiness, and freedom from sadness and fears. As for saffron in a dream, when an unmarried girl sees herself buying it, this indicates that there are some good things that will happen to the girl. As for the gift of saffron in an unmarried girl’s dream, It indicates that she may soon marry a good man who dyes her hair with saffron in an unmarried girl’s dream, because this is for the sake of her humanity with new and happy news that she will receive. Seeing saffron in a dream for a man. The interpretation of seeing saffron in a dream for a man indicates that soon - God willing - he will get married. A woman with a good reputation. Also, seeing saffron in a married man’s dream indicates the stability of family life and the happiness he lives with his wife. Read also: Holding a friend’s hand in a dream. Seeing saffron in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing saffron in a dream for a married woman who sees saffron in cans in the kitchen. It indicates saved money, and God knows best. Also, a married woman buying saffron in a dream indicates a change in her financial situation. And saffron, when a married woman buys it, heralds good news for her. Read also: Backgrounds in a dream Seeing saffron in a dream for a pregnant woman Interpretation of seeing saffron in a dream indicates for a pregnant woman To a healthy pregnancy that you will enjoy. Just as a pregnant woman dreams of saffron, this may be a harbinger of happy news that she will receive from someone close to her. You dream of washing with saffron When you dream that you are washing with saffron, this portends an imminent recovery from illness, God willing. Also, washing with saffron may indicate that The prisoner is about to be released from prison and acquitted, and God knows best. In addition to dreaming of saffron and washing with it in a dream, this may be a harbinger of the traveler’s return or absence. Also...

title: Interpretation of a dream about my lover holding my hand

preview.html: In this article, we will learn through your website gptafser.com/ about the meanings of seeing my beloved holding my hand in a dream in detail. The interpretation of seeing my beloved holding my hand in a dream for a single girl. The unmarried girl when she sees her lover holding her hand in a dream. A metaphor for helping her lover and standing by her side in all the situations of her life and overcoming Problems and difficulties. As for the girl who dreams of seeing someone holding her hand while she is at home in a dream. This dream indicates that you will communicate with the right person in the near future, and God knows best. And if the girl dreams that her lover is holding her hand in the street and she is happy in the dream. A good relationship and marriage From someone she loves and who loves her very much. If an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream holding her lover’s hand in front of her family. She is afraid that her lover will propose marriage soon and be the reason for her happiness. An unmarried girl who sees a young man holding her hand, and she loves him in a dream, indicates good luck, We wish you success, and a feeling of psychological stability. As for seeing a lover holding the hand of an unmarried girl in a dream, this is an indication that he is the person who protects her from the troubles and tragedies of this world and she feels safe with him. As for an unmarried girl who dreams of holding the hand of an impure young man in a dream, it is a sure sign of... She makes bad decisions in her life and does not bear responsibility, and God knows best. To see yourself holding the hand of a lover in a dream for one girl, this indicates the dreamer’s stability with her family. As for the beloved young man holding his girlfriend’s hand in a dream, blushing for her and smiling at her in the dream. This symbolizes The dream refers to his love for her and his sense of security, peace and stability. See also: Interpretation of seeing a lover in a dream and its meaning. Interpretation of seeing my beloved holding my hand in a dream for a married woman. As for a married woman who dreams of her husband holding her hand in a dream. A good vision because it shows deep love and understanding between spouses. A married woman dreams With her husband holding her hand in a dream. A sign of peace of mind. She will receive a lot of sustenance and blessings in her home. The vision also indicates the dreamer’s ability to achieve all her goals in life and fulfill her desires. As for a married woman who dreams that there is someone she loves and is holding her hand in a dream. A sign of... That he is a social personality, and that people really love him. To see yourself holding the hand of a lover in a dream for a married woman is a metaphor for the fulfillment of her desires. As for a married woman who dreams of a dirty hand in a dream, it is not a good sign that she is making wrong decisions in her life, which will lead to losing money. Therefore, she must wait before making a decision. In the case of a married woman, she sees that her husband is holding her hand and leaving it in the dream. This is an indication that there are disagreements, and that she will leave them in the most difficult situations of her life, and God knows best. As for a married woman who dreams of someone holding her hand and kissing her, it is a sign that he feels stable. Warmth and psychological comfort with this person. As for a married woman who sees her husband holding her hand and talking to her in a dream, this is a sign that he is encouraging her to achieve herself. Interpretation of seeing my beloved holding my hand in a dream about a man and its meaning: The man who
